ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Shield of Songs vs Nivs
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats Pava !! ..and Congrats on 52 :) Since Moonflower and you share the same server I hope I never have to Roll against you :) ... On SOS ..there real
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats Pava !! ..and Congrats on 52 :) Since Moonflower and you share
the same server I hope I never have to Roll against you :)
------
On SOS ..there real problem we have is not enough "spell/song" gems :(
I was in Karnor's Dead Captain and SOS was great. Sprit Callers Pets
could not touch me. I just kept mixing it in with VOV and dropped out
NIV's ( right, Niv's does not stack with Shield ) for 51 Largo's. But by
the time I keep the Mana song, run song, and heal song, I have only one
slot left for crowd control. That means no shield songs or any choice
between Mez and Charm..

Sigh

Moonflower Bllue of Cazic-Thule
Still looking for Dragon Drops :(
